Detailed Description

Definitions of memory allocator for sync objects.

Define Documentation

#define CTK_SYNC_MAX   (CTK_SYNC_NUM_TYPES - 1)

The maximum number of the sync type ID

Typedef Documentation

typedef void*(*) ctk_sync_alloc_align_func_t(int obj_type, size_t size, int align)

Aligned memory allocator function type for sync modules (Takes sync object type, memory size to allocate and align size. Returns the allocated pointer)

typedef void*(*) ctk_sync_alloc_func_t(int obj_type, size_t size)

Sync module memory allocator function type (takes sync object type and memory size to allocate, and returns the allocated pointer)

typedef void(*) ctk_sync_free_align_func_t(void *ptr)

Aligned memory free function type for sync modules (Takes memory pointer and frees it)

typedef void(*) ctk_sync_free_func_t(void *ptr)

Sync module memory free function type (takes memory pointer and frees it)

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Enumerator:
CTK_SYNC_OBJECT  Sync object type - Any type
CTK_SYNC_ATOMIC  Sync object type - atomic
CTK_SYNC_MUTEX  Sync object type - mutex
CTK_SYNC_COND  Sync object type - cond
CTK_SYNC_SEM  Sync object type - semaphore
CTK_SYNC_QUEUE  Sync object type - queue
CTK_SYNC_GENERICQ  Sync object type - generic queue
CTK_SYNC_BARRIER  Sync object type - barrier
CTK_SYNC_LIST  Sync object type - list

Function Documentation

ctk_sync_alloc_func_t ctk_get_sync_alloc_func (  ) 

Returns the current memory allocator for sync objects (e.g., mutex, semaphore).

Returns:
the current memory allocator

ctk_sync_free_func_t ctk_get_sync_free_func (  ) 

Returns the current memory free_func for sync objects (e.g., mutex, semaphore).

Returns:
the current memory free_func

ctk_sync_alloc_func_t ctk_set_sync_alloc_func ( ctk_sync_alloc_func_t  allocator  ) 

Sets a new memory allocator for sync objects (e.g., mutex, semaphore). The allocator routine should be of ctk_sync_alloc_func_t, i.e., takes two params sync_type and size and returns a pointer to the allocated region.

Parameters:
[in] allocator - the new memory allocator
Returns:
the old memory allocator

ctk_sync_free_func_t ctk_set_sync_free_func ( ctk_sync_free_func_t  free_func  ) 

Sets a new memory free_func for sync objects (e.g., mutex, semaphore). The free_func routine should be of ctk_sync_free_func_t, i.e., takes two params sync_type and size and returns a pointer to the freeated region.

Parameters:
[in] free_func - the new memory free_func
Returns:
the old memory free_func

ctk_sync_alloc_align_func_t ctk_sync_get_alloc_align_func (  ) 

Returns the current aligned-memory allocator for sync objects.

Returns:
the current memory allocator

ctk_sync_free_align_func_t ctk_sync_get_free_align_func (  ) 

Returns the current aligned-memory free_func for sync objects.

Returns:
the current memory free_func

ctk_sync_alloc_align_func_t ctk_sync_set_alloc_align_func ( ctk_sync_alloc_align_func_t  allocator  ) 

Sets a new aligned-memory allocator for sync objects. The allocator routine should be of ctk_sync_alloc_align_func_t.

Parameters:
[in] allocator - the new memory allocator
Returns:
the old memory allocator

ctk_sync_free_align_func_t ctk_sync_set_free_align_func ( ctk_sync_free_align_func_t  free_func  ) 

Sets a new aligned memory free_func for sync objects. The free_func routine should be of ctk_sync_free_align_func_t.

Parameters:
[in] free_func - the new memory free_func
Returns:
the old memory free_func

Variable Documentation

ctk_sync_alloc_func_t ctk_sync_alloc

A memory allocator for sync objects; you can change the default memory allocator by ctk_sync_set_alloc_func.

ctk_sync_alloc_align_func_t ctk_sync_alloc_align

An aligned memory allocator for sync objects; you can change the default memory allocator by ctk_sync_set_alloc_align_func.

ctk_sync_free_func_t ctk_sync_free

A memory free function for sync objects; you can change the default memory free routine by ctk_sync_set_free_func.

ctk_sync_free_align_func_t ctk_sync_free_align

An aligned memory free function for sync objects; you can change the default memory free routine by ctk_sync_set_free_align_func.
